verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w that|strong="G1492"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* what \w great|strong="G2245"\w* \w conflict|strong="G0073"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add for\add* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Laodicea|strong="G2993"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add for\add* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w have|strong="G3708"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* might be \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w*, being knit \w together|strong="G4822"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of the full \w assurance|strong="G4136"\w* of \w understanding|strong="G4907"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w acknowledgement|strong="G1922"\w* of the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w hid|strong="G0614"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w treasures|strong="G2344"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* should \w beguile|strong="G3884"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* enticing \w words|strong="G4086"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w though|strong="G1487"\w* I be \w absent|strong="G0548"\w* in the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w yet|strong="G0235"\w* am \w I|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w joying|strong="G5463"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beholding|strong="G0991"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w order|strong="G5010"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w stedfastness|strong="G4733"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* ye \w have|strong="G3880"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \add so\add* walk \w ye|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w Rooted|strong="G4492"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* built \w up|strong="G2026"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stablished|strong="G0950"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye have been \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*, \w abounding|strong="G4052"\w* \w there|strong="G0846"\w*\w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w*.

\w Beware|strong="G0991"\w* \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w spoil|strong="G4812"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w philosophy|strong="G5385"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w* \w deceit|strong="G0539"\w*, \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w tradition|strong="G3862"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w rudiments|strong="G4747"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G2730"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w fulness|strong="G4138"\w* of the \w Godhead|strong="G2320"\w* \w bodily|strong="G4985"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w complete|strong="G4137"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w principality|strong="G0746"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* ye are \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w* with the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* made without \w hands|strong="G0886"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* putting \w off|strong="G0555"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of the \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

Buried \w with|strong="G4916"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w*\w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* ye are risen \w with|strong="G4891"\w* \add him\add* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of the \w operation|strong="G1753"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, who hath \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w sins|strong="G3900"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, hath he quickened \w together|strong="G4806"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, having \w forgiven|strong="G5483"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w trespasses|strong="G3900"\w*;

Blotting \w out|strong="G1813"\w* the \w handwriting|strong="G5498"\w* of \w ordinances|strong="G1378"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, which was \w contrary|strong="G5227"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G0142"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w way|strong="G3319"\w*, \w nailing|strong="G4338"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* to his \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*;

\add And\add* having \w spoiled|strong="G0554"\w* \w principalities|strong="G0746"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w powers|strong="G1849"\w*, he made a \w shew|strong="G1165"\w* of them \w openly|strong="G3954"\w*, triumphing \w over|strong="G2358"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G2919"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w meat|strong="G1035"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w drink|strong="G4213"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w respect|strong="G3313"\w* of an \w holyday|strong="G1859"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* of the new \w moon|strong="G3561"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* of the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* \add days\add*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* a \w shadow|strong="G4639"\w* of things to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \add is\add* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

Let no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w beguile|strong="G2603"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* of your \w reward|strong="G2603"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w voluntary|strong="G2309"\w* \w humility|strong="G5012"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipping|strong="G2356"\w* of \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, intruding \w into|strong="G1687"\w* those things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w hath|strong="G3708"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w*, \w vainly|strong="G1500"\w* puffed \w up|strong="G5448"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w fleshly|strong="G4561"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w holding|strong="G2902"\w* the \w Head|strong="G2776"\w*, \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w joints|strong="G0860"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bands|strong="G4886"\w* having nourishment \w ministered|strong="G2023"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* knit \w together|strong="G4822"\w*, increaseth \w with|strong="G0837"\w* the \w increase|strong="G0838"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye be \w dead|strong="G0599"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w rudiments|strong="G4747"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, are ye subject to \w ordinances|strong="G1379"\w*,
(\w Touch|strong="G0680"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*; \w taste|strong="G1089"\w* \w not|strong="G3366"\w*; \w handle|strong="G2345"\w* \w not|strong="G3366"\w*;

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w perish|strong="G5356"\w* with the \w using|strong="G0671"\w*;) \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w commandments|strong="G1778"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doctrines|strong="G1319"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*?

\w Which|strong="G3748"\w* \w things|strong="G3056"\w* \w have|strong="G2076"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* a \w shew|strong="G2192"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* will \w worship|strong="G1479"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w humility|strong="G5012"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w neglecting|strong="G0857"\w* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w satisfying|strong="G4140"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.
